ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 40
ygData.msgSnippet: They will laugh at your enstill spell too :P No seriously, Enstill gets resisted all the time by white or greater and most of the time by blues. I just made 20
ygData.messageBody:
They will laugh at your enstill spell too :P No seriously, Enstill gets
resisted all the time by white or greater and most of the time by blues.
I just made 20 too so it may get better. Either way, you can buy the
spell in your Friendly neighborhood clerics guild.

Croesus Illuminatus (Xegony)

rfunk@... wrote:
>
> From: rfunk@...
>
> BTW, I tried to research Enstill yesterday and it said I lacked the skill to
> fashion an item. =( My research is maxed for my level, any ideas as to what
> level one would get the ability to pull that one off easily? I need Enstill
> the creatures now just laugh at my root spell.
>
> -- Elidain, 20th level Erudite Wizard Veeshan
>
